name: playful-geometric
description: Memphis-inspired. Hard pop shadows. Bouncy interactions. Confetti palette.

name: minimalist-monochrome
description: Editorial luxury design. Pure black and white only. Oversized Playfair Display serif. Hard section rules. Inversion as the only emphasis. No shadows, no radius, no color.

name: linear-modern
description: Cinematic dark UI with ambient blob lighting, mouse-tracking spotlights, layered shadows, and expo-out micro-interactions. The Linear/Vercel/Raycast aesthetic.

name: neo-brutalism
description: Digital punk rebellion against polished SaaS. Thick black borders. Hard ink shadows. Mechanical button press. Cream canvas. Space Grotesk Black. Loud, raw, confident.

name: hand-drawn
description: Authentic imperfection and human touch. Wobbly multi-value border-radius, hard zero-blur offset shadows, Kalam marker headings, Patrick Hand body, dot-grid paper texture, tape and tack decorations, and the press-flat button mechanic. Spontaneous, creative, playful.

name: art-deco
description: Opulence, mathematical precision, and architectural grandeur. Obsidian black with metallic gold, diagonal crosshatch texture, zero border-radius, Marcellus all-caps headings, rotated diamond icon containers, gold glows (never drop shadows), Roman numerals, and theatrical 500ms transitions. The Gatsby aesthetic.
